===Proper noun===
{{zh-proper noun}}

#{{lb|zh|geography}} [[Enping]] (恩平[[市]]), a [[county]]-[[level]] [[city]] in [[Guangdong]], [[China]], [[administer]]ed as [[part]] of the [[prefecture]]-[[level]] [[city]] of [[Jiangmen]] ([[江門]][[市]]).
#{{lb|zh|historical|_|geography}} [[Enping]] [[county|County]] (恩平[[縣]]), a [[former]] [[county]] of [[Guangdong]], [[China]], [[administer]]ed as [[part]] of the [[commandery]] of [[Zhaoqing]] ([[肇慶]][[府]]).
